title: Rollover finger icon
content:
A little strange I know, but I’m sure I’ve seen it before somewhere.

Does anyone know the name of a font that contains internet browser icons? I am looking for the little pointing hand that the arrow turns in to when you hover over a link.

Any help would be great.

Thanks guys.

 [‹ Ragie Original fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162902/http:/typophile.com/node/48566 "Go to previous forum topic") [need to find this if possible ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080821162902/http:/typophile.com/node/48579 "Go to next forum topic")
author: simonjudd
